channel.title: data processing on Stefano Coretta
channel.description: Recent content in data processing on Stefano Coretta

item.title: Vowel formants trajectories and tidy data
item.description: With the advent of more powerful statistical methods for assessing time series data, it is now becoming more common to compare whole vowel formant trajectories rather then just using average values. In this post I will show how to tidy a formant measurements dataset and plot formants using the tidyverse (Wickham 2017). From wide to long To illustrate the process, I will use formant data that was kindly provided by Stephen Nichols.
